testcase.name: My Test

failure.message: Screenshots Match Failed for compare-google-screenshot.png with a tolerance of 0%. Screenshots at: Baseline: test/screenshots/baseline/compare-google-screenshot.png Result: test/screenshots/results/compare-google-screenshot.png Diff: test/screenshots/diffs/compare-google-screenshot.png Open test/screenshots/diffs/compare-google-screenshot.png to see how the screenshot has changed. If the Result Screenshot is correct you can use it to update the Baseline Screenshot and re-run your test: cp test/screenshots/results/compare-google-screenshot.png test/screenshots/baseline/compare-google-screenshot.png
